name: Awakening
description: After your Razor, who has this card equipped, uses Claw and Thunder: 1 of your Electro characters gains 1 Energy. (Active Character prioritized)

descriptionreplaced: After your Razor, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Claw and Thunder</color>: 1 of your Electro characters gains 1 Energy. (Active Character prioritized)
